about_the_game:
■Game Content■

Reset & "destroy" ADV『Re;quartz零度(Re;quartz Raid)』

Compatible with both Windows / Mac, Suspense x BL games for all ages with famous voice actors!

The DVD and DL card versions are out now! Check out this emotionally gripping BL that might just break your heart.

The story takes place in a "Reset World" where the protagonist is stuck in a time loop, forced to repeat the same day over and over.

Uncover the truth and break out of the "Reset".

    ■Synopsis■

The protagonist is on a mission to "put a stop to the madness of the world".

And... to find his killer.

The story begins at the common route, "first day," which will determine your target character.
After your final selection during the "first day," the story will then split into "last day (front)" and "last day (reverse)."

Last day (front)
"Still...... I believe in you."　
You must uphold justice and protect it at all costs, no matter how many lies you tell.

Last day (reverse)
"Was it all a lie ......?"
There is someone dear to you that you want to protect, regardless of who else gets hurt.

There are different storylines/endings for the "last day (front)" and "last day (reverse)" for each character route.

Everyone has two sides, one that we reveal to the world and another we keep hidden - Do you love truly love them? Can you accept them for who they really are? Or will you grow to hate them?

Uncover the light & darkness, love & hatred entangled within...




    ■Game system■

Decision-Based Adventure


This game has branching storylines based on the decisions you make.
Determine Uni's reactions, where to investigate, who to talk to next, and more. Make sure to choose Wisely!

Features available during gameplay:
・ Auto play
・ Skip (only for previously read dialogue / select forced skip to skip unread sections)
・ Text log
・ Save / load
・ Quick save / Quick load
・ Config (voice / BGM / SE volume adjustment)

Beautiful illustration


There are a total of 38 special illustrations to collect.
You can view them at any time by clicking on "Gallery" in the main menu.

Multi-end system



There are 19 unique endings in total.

All completed endings can be found and rewatched under the "Record" tab.
Simply select the "Record" button on the main menu to display the list of completed endings.

Performed by famous voice actors

Please note that this game is not fully voiced.
Scenes with still displays (special illustrations) and ending scenes are full voice.
All other scenes are partially voiced.


    ■Character■

Protagonist


■ Unity (Uni) - Protagonist with an unfortunate [miraculous] fate (CV.Kobayashi Yusuke / 小林裕介)
He hates getting involved in troublesome matters. He's a womanizer....... due to his inability to sleep without the warm touch of another person. Despite his disinterested, lukewarm attitude, he is often soft and caring towards his juniors.

Target characters


■ Nijo - A subordinate who hides his deep "passion" behind his stone face (CV.Mizunaka Masaaki / 水中雅章)
A tall man who is diligent in his duties and enjoys eating any and all things sweet indiscriminately. Although he is very direct with his words, his face is not as easy to read, never showing any emotions. He has sworn to "devote his life, body, and soul" to Unity, however...

■ Mana - A junior who is the embodiment of [filth] "for the sake of his Senpai”(CV.Sakai Koudai / 酒井広大)
The only person in the world who he respects and worships is the protagonist, Unity, whom he lovingly calls "Senpai". He is an exceptionally skilled martial artist and regarded as a specialist in his field. Though he is heavily relied on by the organization to do their dirty work, he doesn't care as his only priority in life is his Senpai. He is rather fond of smoking cigarettes.

■ Akira Konoe - Does he wear a mask of "passion" or "pathos"? (CV.Okawa Genki / 大河元気)
A university student who studies music. He was born into a noble family, and is known as 'the piano nobleman' around town. Like the roll of the dice, he is a mysterious young man whose personality and impressions change every time you meet. Which version is his true identity...

■ Lionel - [A young lion] who loves, hates, and shoots down the world (CV.Morikawa Toshiyuki / 森川智之)
Although he is a talented boss, many of his subordinates and those close to him have died is peculiar ways. It's as if a mysterious cloud of death surrounds him. His actions and attitude towards Unity suggest some kind of past or divine connection, however, he himself has no recollection of it.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X
  • Processor: Core2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280×720
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

name: Re;quartz零度

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: Core2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280×720
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Windows/Mac両対応、リセット”破壊”ADV【サスペンス系ループもの×全年齢対象BLゲーム!】物語の舞台は、同じ日を何度も繰り返す”リセット世界” 登場人物は全員”嘘吐き” 仮面を剥がすも、舞踏会に狂じるもご自由に― 超豪華声優陣参加:小林裕介/水中雅章/酒井広大/森川智之/大河元気(敬称略)
